Components_Example_Title: @pep-addons/ngx-lib : Pepperi Components - Library components written with Angular10
Configuration_Fields_Explanation: Select the fields wich contains the item's UOM information. The fields can be an item level fields or a UDT/Calculated transaction line fields, with the folowing content for exmaple:
Uom_Table_NoItems: UOMs are not defined. click add to define it.
Uom_DeleteModal_Paragraph: Are you sure you want to delete this UOM?
Uom_AtdConfig_Paragraph: Configure the quantity module fields and behavior.
Uom_AtdConfig_Instructions: Please notify that after saving the configuration, several fields with AOQM prefix will be added to the selected transaction. Place those fields in the relevant order center and cart views.
Uom_duplicateKey_Paragraph: Cannot add uom that already exist. To edit it, please select it from the list
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_FirstLine: This module add support in multiple UOMs per item.
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_SecondLine: As Part of the installtion, the following will takes place:
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_FirstLi: The Unints Quantity field will be read only and will contain the total quantity in singles.
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_SecondLi: Two new drop down fields and two new Units Quantity fields (with the AQQM prefix) will be added to the transaction to allow the user select the required UOM and define the quantity.
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_ThirdLine: Place these fields in the relevant order center and cart views.
Uom_AtdInstallationScreen_LastLine: Note: You can use both sets (to allow the user order in two UOMs) or only the first one (to allow the user order in one UOM).
